pageContent: Purpose of review: The estimated disease-free survival rates are approximately equivalent across standard treatments for localized prostate cancer. We aim to review the efforts being made to reduce posttreatment erectile dysfunction, a major morbidity of these therapies.

metaData.source:
Development and validation of the korean version of expanded prostate cancer index composite: questionnaire assessing health-related quality of life after prostate cancer treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20856644/
